Paragraph.Text: Easily swap lenses across your whole base with this one machine!

- Place, and provide with power. 64 power is used per swap. - The must be "set" to a new-lens by inserting (T) lenses into the machine manually. - Once set, the machine will also pull lenses for adjacent machines if it's internal buffer empties. - Follow HUD-pop-up text for handling any issues. - Press "Interact" (E) to start the machine. - At any time, extract (Q) from the machine to reset it. retrieving any new-lenses still in the buffer.
Notes on next page.

- The machine only has an internal buffer for new-lenses. If not trashing: the machine will not remove a lense from an LPT if it cannot deposit the lense to an adjacent machine. The machine will wait to offload. - The machine is rate-limited to roughly 20 swaps per second.
